title: OCE Recruitment for Clash (NEED TOP, JG, ADC mains)
body:
Add me for clash: Lulu uwu waifu (I'm in platinum, last year Diamond 3)

Looking for (Tier 2, 3) players

Please leave a comment with your username to make sure I don't add randoms
